title: Footer Notes
body:
Footnotes can include anything from a citation to parenthetical information, outside sources, copyright permissions, background information, and anything in between, though certain style guides restrict when footnotes can be used..

You can mark the text in the editor and set as Footer notes to see them appear at the bottom of the page. 

Ut vitae convallis metus, finibus iaculis metus. Donec congue dignissim ligula at scelerisque. Nam id aliquam lectus, at posuere mi.
